message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a steal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the enthusiasm, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you be open to $80? That's the maximum I can afford.

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $100. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
